    • Constructor Detail

      • EstimateLinearAllocStep

        public EstimateLinearAllocStep(ProjectFilesystem filesystem,
                       java.nio.file.Path pathToJarOrClassesDirectory)
        This uses a linear alloc estimator that uses the size of the .class file as the estimate. This should be used when speed is more important than accuracy. If accuracy is a priority, an estimator based on DalvikStatsTool.getEstimate(java.io.InputStream) should be used instead.
